mapper.sql: id, empid, userid, aptid, paytypeid, moneynum, comment, createdate
mapper.select:
SELECT t_charge.id, t_charge.empid, t_charge.userid, t_charge.aptid, t_charge.paytypeid, t_charge.moneynum, t_charge.`comment`, t_charge.createdate, t_emp.username AS empname, t_user.username, t_paytype.paytype, t_user.phonenumber FROM t_charge INNER JOIN t_emp ON t_charge.empid = t_emp.id INNER JOIN t_user ON t_user.empid = t_emp.id AND t_charge.userid = t_user.id INNER JOIN t_apt ON t_apt.empid = t_emp.id AND t_apt.userid = t_user.id INNER JOIN t_paytype ON t_charge.paytypeid = t_paytype.id AND t_apt.paytypeid = t_paytype.id
WHERE t_user.username LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR t_user.phonenumber LIKE '%{keyword}%'
